titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Ronald I. McKinnon papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by David Jacobs

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2016-10-11T10:00-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: October 11, 2016: Revised to update spelling of Bretton for consistency

did.abstract: Correspondence and writings relating to international finance, especially to currency exchange.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials were acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 2015.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Ronald I. McKinnon papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

chronitem.event: Awarded B.A. degree, University of Alberta
Joined the faculty of Stanford University as a professor of economics
Author, The Implications of International Economic Integration for Monerary, Fiscal, and Exchange-Rate Policy
Author, Money and Capital in Economic Development
Author, The Order of Economic Liberalization: Financial Control in the Transition to a Market Economy
Author, The Rules of the Game: International Money and Exchange Rates
Author, Exchange Rates under the East Asian Dollar Standard: Living with Conflicted Virtue
Author, The Unloved Dollar Standard: From Bretton Woods to the Rise of China

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence and writings relating to international finance, especially to currency exchange.
